DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value:
select Cust_key, to_number(extractValue(PREDICTION_DETAILS(DMUSER.ODM_LTV_BIN USING CUST_KEY, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_5) AS M_INCOME_LVL, 'valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_6)' AS M_MARITAL_ST, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_7) AS M_CRDT_RATE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_1) AS M_AGE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_8) AS M_MONTHS_CONTACT ),'Details/@node')) M_DYN_PRED_LTV_NODE,
PREDICTION(DMUSER.ODM_LTV_BIN USING CUST_KEY, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_5) AS M_INCOME_LVL, 'valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_6)' AS M_MARITAL_ST, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_7) AS M_CRDT_RATE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_1) AS M_AGE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_8) AS M_MONTHS_CONTACT ) M_DYN_PRED_BIN,
PREDICTION_PROBABILITY(DMUSER.ODM_LTV_BIN USING CUST_KEY, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_5) AS M_INCOME_LVL, 'valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_6)' AS M_MARITAL_ST, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_7) AS M_CRDT_RATE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_1) AS M_AGE, valueof(NQ_SESSION.ODM_ARG_8) AS M_MONTHS_CONTACT ) M_DYN_PRED_PROB
from ODM_SAMP_CUSTOMERS_V
